data.title: Supplement for residents of small and rural communities â€“ Canada Carbon Rebate (CCR) for individuals
data.meta_description: Information on the supplement for residents of small and rural communities for the climate action incentive payments.
data.text:
Do qualify for the supplement, if your primary residence is located outside all listed municipalities or outside the shaded area of a map, you are considered to be residing outside a CMA and you do qualify for the supplement.

Tick the box on page 2 of your income tax and benefit return.

Do not qualify for the supplement, if your primary residence is located within a listed municipality or within the shaded area, you are considered to live within a CMA.

Do not tick the box on page 2 of your income tax and benefit return.
